org_name: National Collegiate Preparatory Public Charter High School
description: The mission of National Collegiate Preparatory Public Charter High School is (1) to provide a rigorous 9thâ€“12th grade standards-based college preparatory curriculum, (2) to provide an interdisciplinary curriculum which integrates international studies themes across the academic curriculum leading to an International Baccalaureate (IB) Diploma and (3) to prepare our students to be self-directed, life-long learners equipped to be engaged 21st century citizens of their school, community, country and world.
